summary: The CMV–22 Reliability and Readiness Enhancement Act authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to integrate nacelle improvement modifications into the CMV–22 aircraft fleet. This aims to enhance operational readiness, reduce maintenance, and support logistics, particularly in the Indo-Pacific. The bill instructs the Secretary to prioritize modifications, consider industrial base impacts, and use existing funds. It also mandates a report to Congress detailing the modifications' status, performance, industrial impacts, and recommendations for further action.
